Chapter.Title: Practice Exercise 6-7 Solution
Chapter.Data:
from GlassElevator import GlassElevator
current_floor = 0 elevator = GlassElevator()
while elevator.at_bottom() == False: current_floor = current_floor -1 elevator.go_to_floor(current_floor)
print 'The lowest floor is ' +str(current_floor)
